landing.headline: Step into the arena with RALLYU!
landing.subheadline: Where classic games meet real-time challenge. Play fast-paced Ping Pong and clever Tic Tac Toe — all in your browser.

description.pingpong: Duel in lightning-fast Ping Pong matches or outsmart rivals in Tic Tac Toe — all in real time.

feature_1.title: Real-Time Matches
feature_1.description: Challenge friends or find random opponents from around the world.

feature_2.title: Lightning-Fast Ping Pong
feature_2.description: Fast-paced rallies, thrilling matches, and epic leaderboard climbing excitement.

feature_3.title: Strategic Tic Tac Toe
feature_3.description: Simple to learn, strategic to master—every move counts.

feature_4.title: Live Chat
feature_4.description: Talk, laugh, and plan your next move with opponents and friends.

feature_5.title: Play Anywhere
feature_5.description: Play anytime, anywhere with a smooth and seamless experience on any device.

feature_6.title: Sleek, Modern UI
feature_6.description: Clean and intuitive design for casual and competitive players alike.
